items.title: ASUS’ Harpe Ace Mini lightweight gaming mouse is 54% off for fall Prime Day at $60 low
items.summary:
As part of its ongoing fall Prime Day sale, Amazon is offering ASUS’ ROG Harpe Ace Mini wireless gaming mouse in black for $59.99 shipped. This is regularly a $130 gaming mouse, which is now seeing a solid 54% discount. Today’s deal shaves $70 off its usual going rate, essentially saving you more than what you’re paying for it right now. It’s now matching the lowest price we first tracked for it last month, and Best Buy is matching it today as part of its Techtober sale. Head below for more details.

more…

items.title: California bans loud commercials on Netflix, Hulu, and other streaming services
items.summary: Starting July 1, 2026, streaming services won’t be allowed to “transmit the audio of commercial advertisements louder than the video content the advertisements accompany,” according to the bill's text.

items.title: Segway’s highly advanced Xafari and Xyber e-bikes get $400 Prime Day price cuts to new and returning lows from $2,000
items.summary:
As part of its Fall Prime Day Sale, Segway is saving folks hundreds of dollars on EVs, with some notable discounts on the e-bikes, specifically, that deserve some spotlight time. During this short-term sale, you can hop on the Xafari e-bike at $1,999.99 shipped, while the more advanced Xyber e-bike is down at $2,900 shipped. These newer releases normally fetch $2,400 and $3,300 at full price, with the discounts we have seen in their short time on the market being scarce and only going as low as $2,000 and $3,000. Today’s deal sees the return of the Xafari’s $400 markdown, while the Xyber is getting a larger-than-ever $400 markdown to match, landing them at their return and new lowest prices to date.

items.summary:
As part of the now live Prime Day sale, Amazon is offering a series of notable deals at up to 53% off from one of our favorite Apple gear accessory brands – Twelve South. The brand makes one of the nicest MagSafe charging stands out there, and it is they at the best prices we have tracked. You’ll also find some notable deals on its Find My-equipped Plug-Bug wall chargers, flight-ready wireless transmitters for your AirPods, and much more up grabs at deep sale prices for the fall Prime Day festivities.

items.title: Qualcomm is acquiring DIY electronics platform Arduino
items.summary: Qualcomm is acquiring Arduino, the Italian open-source electronics platform behind a range of boards for tinkerers, DIY hobbyists, and educators, for an undisclosed amount. In an announcement on Tuesday, Qualcomm says the Arduino “brand, tools, and mission” will remain independent while still building microcontrollers and microprocessors with chips from multiple manufacturers. In addition to the […]

items.title: JPMorgan Chase reports that $1.2T of debt is now tied to AI-related companies, making it the largest segment in the investment-grade market (Caleb Mutua/Bloomberg)
items.summary:
Caleb Mutua / Bloomberg:
JPMorgan Chase reports that $1.2T of debt is now tied to AI-related companies, making it the largest segment in the investment-grade market  —  The amount of debt tied to artificial intelligence has ballooned to $1.2 trillion, making it the largest segment in the investment-grade market, according to JPMorgan Chase & Co.

items.title: Security bug in India’s income tax portal exposed taxpayers’ sensitive data
items.summary: TechCrunch verified that the security bug in the Indian Income Tax Department's e-Filing portal exposed taxpayers' data to other users. The security researchers who found the flaw say the data leak is now fixed.

items.title: Segway is offering up to $410 in Navimow Prime Day savings on robot mowers with FREE gear starting from new $699 low
items.summary:
Segway Navimow is offering up to $410 in Prime Big Deal Days savings on its i series of robot mowers, which is partially coming in the form of FREE gear. You’ll find the brand’s i105 Robot Lawn Mower down at $899 shipped, while the i110 Robot Lawn Mower is going for $1,099 shipped – with both models getting a free Garage S add-on (valued at $200) alongside purchases. On the flip side, at Amazon, you can find the i105 robot at $699 shipped, and the i110 robot at $909 shipped, but without the free add-on gear. These two autonomous helpers normally run for $999 and $1,299 at full price, with the i110 model having only been discounted to this same rate over 2025, aside from the one-time $999 low from July, while the i105 model has dropped as low as $749, also last seen in July. You’re looking at the second-best price on the i110 and third-best price on the i105, and some of the largest overall savings that we’ve tracked over the year – for the bundled options. Going with Amazon scores you two new all-time low prices.

more…

items.summary:
As part of Amazon’s Prime Big Deal Days event, Vantrue’s official storefront is offering up to 30% discounts across a selection of its multi-channel dash cams, some of which are dropping to new low prices. Starting at the most affordable, Vantrue’s N4S 3-Channel Dash Cam can be yours for $174.99 shipped. Normally, this model would cost you $250 at full price, with discounts over the year having taken the costs as low as $200 until today. Now, for an unknown amount of time, you can upgrade your vehicle with $75 savings at a new all-time low price. You’ll find three more of the brand’s notable models and their discounted prices below.

items.title: Bring home a eufy autonomous cleaner from Anker with up to 58% Prime Day savings, robots start from a $200 low
items.summary:
As part of Amazon’s Prime Big Deal Days event, Anker is offering up to 58% discounts across a selection of its eufy robot vacuums and mops – with this being an opportune time to bring home some autonomous cleaning support at some of the best prices of the year. The biggest discount is on the most budget-friendly of the bunch, the eufy C10 Robot Vacuum at $199.99 shipped. Fetching $480 at full price since hitting the market back in March, discounts have mostly kept costs above $230 in the months since, more recently going lower to $220 and $200. Now that all-time low price is coming back around, giving you $280 in savings while Prime Day savings last. Head below for more on this robot and the others getting discounts.

items.summary: (Reuters) -Donald Trump's threat to invoke a federal anti-insurrection law to expand his deployment of military personnel to U.S. cities has intensified the legal battle between the president and Democratic-led cities, as hundreds of National Guard troops from Texas on Tuesday prepared to patrol the streets of Chicago. items.title: Score $2,000 in exclusive savings on EcoFlow’s DELTA Pro Ultra power station with a FREE 400W solar panel at $3,799 low
items.summary:
Folks looking for significantly more backup power support to cover home systems will find an ample opportunity in the exclusive savings we’ve got for our readers from Wellbots, where you can now pick up the EcoFlow DELTA Pro Ultra Portable Power Station with a FREE 400W solar panel for $3,799 shipped, after using the code 9TODPU5 at checkout for an additional 5% off. Dropping down from its $5,799 MSRP to $3,999, the extra savings takes the cost back down to the best rate we have tracked, though in the past those deals never included the free solar panel. Not only are you getting $2,000 in exclusive savings for a return all-time low on the initial inverter + battery combo that makes up the base power station, but you’re getting FREE solar gear added on for expanded capabilities.

items.title: Save up to 46% on Segway EVs for Prime Day, like the premium Max G3 smart e-scooter at $1,100 (Reg. $1,200), more
items.summary:
Segway has launched its Fall Prime Day Sale, with up to 46% discounts on a selection of its EVs directly from its website, as well as through Amazon. One notable price cut that’s been a long time coming is the Segway Max G3 Electric Scooter dropping to $1,099.99 shipped, with the price matched at Amazon too. It carries a $1,500 MSRP, though we’ve seen it keep down at $1,200 for the majority of the year since releasing in March, save for the $900 and $1,000 pre-sale and launch deals. Aside from those first-time discounts, you’re otherwise getting the best price since during this event, giving you $100 off the going rate for the third-best price we have tracked. Head below for more on this advanced cruiser and the other models benefiting from discounts.

items.summary:
Hiboy has launched a Better Than Prime Day Sale with up to 52% discounts across its lineup of EVs, like the U2 Pro Electric Scooter for $899.99 shipped, which beats out its Amazon pricing by $354. Launched back in April, it’s been carrying a $1,500 MSRP since, which discounts have mostly kept costs above $1,060, with some other falls lower to $900, more often directly from the brand like we’re seeing during this sale. While the savings last, you’ll benefit from a $600 price cut from its MSRP to the lowest price we have tracked. Be sure to head below for more on this scooter and the other notable EVs seeing discounts.

items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale, Amazon is offering Samsung’s 1TB 990 EVO Plus SSD for $59.99 shipped. This is originally a $110 drive that has lately been fetching $75 at Amazon and directly at Samsung’s site, where it’s currently going for $70. Today’s fall Prime Day deal shaves $15 off its usual going rate, marking the return of the lowest price it briefly hit at B&H earlier this year. You can also get this in 2TB and 4TB capacities, and they’re both discounted right now as well at $129.99 and $199.99 shipped. Head below for more details.

items.summary:
As part of the ongoing Prime Big Deal Days sale, Amazon is offering Microsoft’s Surface Laptop (2025) touchscreen Copilot+ PC for $649.99 shipped. This entry-level model, equipped with 16GB of RAM and 256GB of storage, debuted at $900 a few months back. It dropped to the $700 mark shortly after the previous Prime Day sale, but today’s 28% discount shaves an additional $50 off. This is the lowest price we have tracked for this touchscreen notebook to date, so be sure to snag it if you were eyeing one of these. The 16GB/512GB variant of this laptop is also down to $799.99 shipped, which is the lowest we have seen it fetch to date. Head below for more details.

items.title: How Israel's war in Gaza has engulfed the entertainment industry, including popular TV shows produced in Israel going dark on US streaming services like Netflix (Wall Street Journal)
items.summary:
